Prayer_Book_of_the_Daily_Sacrifice.function: Liturgical formulae for the Tamid offering (morning & evening)
Prayer_Book_of_the_Daily_Sacrifice.evidence: The Mishnah (Tamid 1:1-5) and the Dead Sea Scroll 4QInstruction (a liturgical manual) show a standardized set of prayers recited by priests.

Hymnals_Psalm_Choir.function: Collections of Hallel (Psalms 113-118, 145-150) and other communal songs
Hymnals_Psalm_Choir.evidence: 4QPs and 4Q405 (a liturgical psalm) were found at Qumran, indicating a Temple-style repertoire.

Purity_Codes_Sacrificial_Instructions.function: Detailed rules for ritual purity, sacrificial procedure, and temple service
Purity_Codes_Sacrificial_Instructions.evidence: The Mishnah (Kelim, Taharot) preserves a tradition of written halakhic manuals that likely originated in a written 'Temple Code' kept in the Court of the Priests.

Temple_Calendar_Festival_Liturgies.function: Fixed schedule of festivals (Passover, Shavuot, Sukkot, etc.) with specific sacrificial rites
Temple_Calendar_Festival_Liturgies.evidence: The Book of Jubilees (1 Enochic) and the Dead Sea Scroll 4QCalendar reflect an institutional calendar that the Temple would have used.
